review: My family truly loves this product. It is absolutely user friendly, the children are able to find the program or movie they were actually looking for and other subjects, such as movies their parents told them about. Being a member of Amazon Prime pays for itself in no time. The price is unbelievable and it comes with its' own remote control, batteries included. You cannot go wrong with this product.
